description: Zodiacal figure in form of man with head of horse. Representing God of the Constellation Hsing. Grey earthenware with white ground. Painted with flesh-coloured pigments; Daoist symbol for the principle 'The Creative; Heaven' (Ch'ien =) see cat. card for better description.
medium: Earthenware with white slip and traces of pigment
object_name: Horse from Set of Zodiac Figures
title: Horse from Set of Zodiac Figures
